attributes.action:
Ask the question why are the Rochdale abusers 
Getting free legal aid?
attributes.background:
The laws are suppose to serve the victims of 
Of abuse not give tax payers money to
Help the attackers get off their punishment. 
Why are the Muslim gang getting legal aid?
Why did  Lee Rigbys killer get compensation?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

In any case, we can't accept your petition because all individual case funding decisions are taken by the Legal Aid Agency. Ministers are prevented by law from intervening in this process.
